peopleAlsoAsk.question: What is Amazon Forecast Service?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Amazon Forecast is a fully managed deep learning service for time-series forecasting. By providing Amazon Forecast with historical time-series data, you can predict future points in the series. Time-series forecasting is useful in multiple domains, including retail, financial planning, supply chain, and healthcare.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Amazon Forecast Documentation

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What is the Forecast package in R?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: The R package forecast provides methods and tools for displaying and analysing univariate time series forecasts including exponential smoothing via state space models and automatic ARIMA modelling.

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Is Amazon Forecast no longer available?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: After careful consideration, we have made the decision to close new customer access to Amazon Forecast, effective July 29, 2024. Amazon Forecast existing customers can continue to use the service as normal.
